Text.val: 31.07.2014 SH SCR19030 Added module "Check with other bankaccounts"
11.11.2013 SH SCR18514 Added CLNA duplicate check by using CLBA fields
31.12.2012 GB SCR17779 Test if only one row exists in CLIENT_ADVANCE: removed additional the condition CLNA_REQAMOUNT = 100
... prepare dynamic range for CLNA selection
(If yes it will be created in subtask via BSF116)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*), min(CLNA_ID), min(CLNA_DEBC_NO) from :1/CLNA exception join :1/SCPI on SCPI_CLNA_ID = CLNA_ID where CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED = 'N' and CLNA_REQAMOUNT = :3 and CLNA_CURRENCY = ':4' and CLNA_DEBC_NO > 0 :2 for fetch only
